bill.summary:
Future Defense Artificial Intelligence Technology Assessment Act or the Future DATA Act
This bill directs the Department of Defense (DOD) to report on its artificial intelligence (AI) strategy.
The report shall include
an analysis of the increasing use of AI by DOD, identification of any data gaps, identification of applicable ethical guidelines, plans to protect systems from bad actors, expected benefits of AI for Armed Forces operations, and plans for collaboration.
